about_the_game: To protect children, ChilloutVR has filter options in place to allow hiding specific user-created content within the game. The ChilloutVR Mature Content Access is the required expansion to allow toggling those options, without this expansion, all mature options are forcefully disabled.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content created and published by users of the community requires the mature content access DLC to be seen, displayed, or accessed in the game. The ChilloutVR Mature Content Access DLC will unlock options to enable or disable mature / adult-only content in the game.

detailed_description: To protect children, ChilloutVR has filter options in place to allow hiding specific user-created content within the game. The ChilloutVR Mature Content Access is the required expansion to allow toggling those options, without this expansion, all mature options are forcefully disabled.

name: ChilloutVR - Mature Content Access
